thread.title: Soul to Sole 5k Run or Walk - Pittsburg State University
thread.title_full: Soul to Sole 5k Run or Walk - Pittsburg State University

author: @localist
title: Soul to Sole 5k Run or Walk - Pittsburg State University
text: About this Event 1701 S. Broadway, Pittsburg, KS 66762 [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSceLOCVi3tiIKzZydJTmpro2QUVMoX86QnsrXt54AbICCyxLA/viewform?usp=sf_link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSceLOCVi3tiIKzZydJTmpro2QUVMoX86QnsrXt54AbICCyxLA/viewform?usp=sf_link) [View map](#about_map) Register and donate a pair of gently worn or new shoes, socks, or any amount of cash. 100% of proceeds will go to the Spark Wheel Foundation, a non-profit within the school of Pittsburg to provide resources and services to children who are in need. Upon registration, you will get a free T-shirt and a custom-designed water bottle from the PSU Plastics department. There are only 61 T-Shirts so be sure to register quickly to get one before they run out! If you are unable to attend but would like to donate, email me at [mshelby@gus.pittstate.edu](mailto:mshelby@gus.pittstate.edu) and I will provide you with more information This event takes place outside of Russ Hall on November 9th, starting at 10 a.m. Event Details See Who Is Interested User Activity No recent activity
